feed.title: Ice Cubes Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.55
entry.content:
• To speed up the app, the automatic streaming of new posts has been disabled on the home timeline. You can use push to refresh instead.
  • Tap the timeline tab to scroll to top is back!
  • An old icon is back!
  • Various fixes.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.56
entry.content:
• Various fixes related to the video player.
  • Fix the notifications filter.
  • Optimise timeline scrolling.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.57
entry.content:
• Fix the iPad app being refreshed when resuming from the background.
  • Increase the timeline page size when fetching posts, increasing the speed at which all posts are loaded into your timeline.
  • Fix various issue related to restoring your current scroll position

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.58
entry.content:
• Ice Cubes will now correctly embed quotes from Threads accounts!
  • Fix the photo viewer being too small on iPad.
  • Fix the editor custom emojis modal being too small.
  • Fix the editor draft modal being too small.

entry.title: New release for Ice Cubes: App Store 1.10.59
entry.content:
• The tap on the post counter to scroll to the latest unread post is back.
  • You can now enable new posts streaming in the settings, itâ€™s not on by default.
  • Reworked a bit some settings to make them clearer.
  • Fix the home timeline restore from the marker API.
